title: Vaibhav Lakshmi Haaram Set with Emeralds, Rubies, Diamonds, and Pearls
materials: High-Quality Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (estimated 24.25 carats)
and South Sea Pearls (estimated 57.38 carats). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: This exquisite three-layered Haaram features intricate floral motifs and paisley designs, expertly crafted with a closed setting to showcase the brilliance of the diamonds and vibrant emeralds. The Haaram showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship with the use of rubies, diamonds, pearls and emeralds. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's elegance. The earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and stunning set.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
and lustrous white pearls. This classic color palette is highly auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other significant celebrations. Also suitable for upscale modern events and gala dinners.
description: This Haaram is a true investment piece, blending timeless South Indian tradition with exceptional gemstone quality and craftsmanship. The intricate design and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. Owning this set is owning a piece of Telugu heritage and a symbol of prosperity (Vaibhav Lakshmi).
